Data-map documentation
======================

Welcome to the documentation of the data-map tutorial. This documentation covers the steps taken to create a simple data map using D3.js.

The final result can be seen here: http://lvonlanthen.github.io/data-map

This tutorial was created for the webmap workshop being held on January 20-21 2016 at the University of Bern.


Contents:

.. toctree::
    :glob:
    :maxdepth: 2

    steps/*
